title: OR Company Brand
text: The OR Company is a fictional project designed to illustrate what a modern Software Development Company's brand might look like today. In this project, I present a straightforward brand showcase, excluding the brand manual.

title: Social Media Promotion
text: In this project for the social media of a fictional burger restaurant, I present a promotional banner (post) that could be used both on social media and as physical banners.

title: To Do Dashboard Web App
text: To do Dashboard, a concept for a mobile web app designed to help users organize their tasks efficiently and intuitively. In this project, I developed the complete visual identity and the entire user experience (UX/UI).
